occupation: Politician, President of the United States
achievements: Led the US during World War I
Proposed the Fourteen Points for peace

occupation: Politician, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
achievements: Served as Prime Minister twice (1964-1970 and 1974-1976)
Led Britain during a period of social and economic change
Introduced the concept of 'the mixed economy'
Co-founder and leader of the Beach Boys
Known for innovative musical arrangements and complex harmonies
Known for comedic roles in films such as 'Wedding Crashers' and 'Zoolander'
Pulitzer Prize and Tony Award-winning playwright known for his 'Pittsburgh Cycle' of plays exploring the African-American experience
